name: Clear The Blocks - Pop Colors
description:
Beautifully challenging puzzle game about crushing the blocks, the higher the number of the blocks, the better! Really addictive and super fun!

Check out this beautifully colorful puzzle game. Tap your finger over the blocks and crush them, can you destroy all the blocks?

This game is full of surprises and endless fun. Oh yeah, it is a lot harder than it looks!

RULES
• Try to destroy as many blocks as possible.
• Three minutes of time
• Thirty times to destroy blocks

HOW TO EARN SCORE
• Each destroyed block is worth 100 points

HOW TO GET TIME BONUS
• Each remaining second gives you one point.

PLAY AGAINST REAL PEOPLE
• Play against real people for free and challenge yourself to cash games when you are ready to compete and win!
• In head to head games both players trying to solve same puzzle and player who finished with the most points win!
• Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world and gives many fun and challenging moments with the game.
• If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play for free.
